message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value to you, I am offering it at a price of $950,000. This offer is tailored to provide you with the best possible deal while ensuring a fair return for us. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you need more information to consider it.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of the product, $950,000 is unfortunately outside of my budget. I'm willing to pay $750,000 for it, which is still a significant amount for me and allows you to make a healthy profit. I believe this offer is fair to both of us. Let me know your thoughts.

Thank you for your response, Bob. After considering your offer, I've decided to counter with a price of $825,000 for the product. This offer aims to provide a balance between your needs and our business goals. I hope this revised proposal will be more in line with what you're looking for. Please let me know your thoughts.
